com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Interface ClusterExecutor

  • Deprecated. 
    The entire PRCluster project is deprecated in favor of the modularized cluster in platform/kernel/cluster. This project will eventually be removed sometime post 7.3. See: platform/kernel/cluster/README.MD for more information and instructions. Contact GenesisTeam@pega.com if you have any questions

    @Deprecated
public interface ClusterExecutor
    ExecutorService like interface for running distributed jobs

      • canExecuteOn

        boolean canExecuteOn(java.util.UUID node)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether it is possible to execute on the given node
        Parameters:
        node - unique id
        Returns:
        true if execution can be performed on the indicated node.
